    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(boolean single,
      int port,
      java.lang.String Game_ID)
        creates a server.
        Parameters:
        single - if the server is being used for single player or not.
        port - the port to run the server on.
        Game_ID - the game id. must be the same as the one used on client side. otherwise it will not connect.
